doc:
Hope Emerson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hope_Emerson 0 Hope Emerson (October 29, 1897 – April 24, 1960; some sources cite October 30, 1897) was an American actress, vaudeville and nightclub performer, and strongwoman. An imposing person physically, she weighed between 190 and 230 pounds and stood six-feet-two-inches tall in her prime. Hope_Emerson ( October_29_,_1897 – April_24_,_1960 ; some_sources cite October_30_,_1897 ) was an_American_actress_,_vaudeville_and_nightclub_performer , and strongwoman . An_imposing_person physically , she weighed between 190_and_230_pounds and stood_six-feet-two-inches tall in her_prime .
